campaign_metrics.no_daily_data: No daily performance data available for the selected date range.
campaign_metrics.error_404:
No metrics data available for this campaign. This could be because:
• Metrics haven't been synced yet
• Campaign is too new
• No ad spend/activity recorded
• Campaign may not exist
campaign_metrics.error_401: Authentication required. Please log in again.
campaign_metrics.error_403: Access denied. You may not have permission to view this campaign.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: ("we," "our," or "us") operates the advertising intelligence and benchmarking platform (the "Service"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our advertising intelligence and benchmarking platform.
introduction.paragraph2: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the Service.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.intro: We may collect personally identifiable information that you voluntarily provide to us, including:

items.name_email: Name and email address (for account registration)
items.billing_info: Billing information (processed securely by third-party payment processors)

advertising_data.title: Advertising Data
advertising_data.intro: When you connect your advertising accounts (Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads), we collect:

items.metrics: Campaign performance metrics (impressions, clicks, conversions, spend)

automatic_info.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic_info.intro: We may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage:

items.logs: Log information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
items.usage: Usage data (features used, time spent, clicks)

how_we_use.title: How We Use Your Information
how_we_use.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.provide_service: Provide, operate, and maintain our Service
items.process_transactions: Process transactions and send related information
items.respond_support: Respond to comments, questions, and customer service requests
items.improve_service: Improve our Service and develop new features
items.detect_issues: Detect, prevent, and address technical issues

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

service_providers.title: Service Providers
service_providers.intro: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf:

items.hosting: Cloud hosting providers (for data storage and processing)

aggregated_data.title: Aggregated Data
aggregated_data.description: We may share aggregated, anonymized data for industry benchmarking purposes. This data cannot be used to identify individual users or accounts.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information:

items.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
items.isolation: Multi-tenant architecture with complete data isolation
items.monitoring: Monitoring and logging of system activities

data_security.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.intro: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy:

items.account: Account information: Until you delete your account
items.advertising: Advertising data: For the duration of your subscription plus 2 years for analytics
items.usage: Usage data: Up to 3 years for service improvement
items.legal: Legal compliance: As required by applicable laws

your_rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
your_rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.access: Access: Request access to your personal information
items.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
items.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
items.portability: Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
items.objection: Objection: Object to processing of your personal information
items.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

your_rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

international_transfers.title: International Data Transfers
international_transfers.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.

third_party_links.title: Third-Party Links
third_party_links.description: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

children_privacy.title: Children's Privacy
children_privacy.description: Our Service is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will delete such information.

changes_policy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes_policy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the \"Last updated\" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

modals.export_ready_message: Your export is ready for download.
modals.preparing_export_message: Please wait while we prepare your export...

placeholders.report_description: Brief description of what this report tracks
placeholders.code_name_help: Lowercase, no spaces (used for internal identification)

helpers.separate_emails: Separate multiple emails with commas. Leave empty to download only.

type_descriptions.performance: Overall performance metrics across all campaigns

helpers.filter_by_objective: Filter alert to specific campaign objective only
helpers.metric_to_monitor: The metric to monitor for anomalies
helpers.combined_best_accuracy: Combined uses all methods for best accuracy
helpers.ai_powered_detection: AI-powered detection that automatically identifies unusual patterns in your campaign performance.
helpers.select_notification_channel: Please select at least one notification channel

detection_descriptions.zscore: Detects values that deviate significantly from the statistical average
detection_descriptions.iqr: Identifies outliers using quartile ranges (robust for skewed data)
detection_descriptions.percentage_change: Detects sudden spikes or drops in performance
detection_descriptions.seasonal: Compares today's performance to same day-of-week historical data
detection_descriptions.combined: Uses all methods together for comprehensive detection
